root.name: Tales of Innocence R
root.description: OverviewTales of Innocence R is a remake of Tales of Innocence being developed by Namco Bandai for PlayStation Vita. It adds a number of new features, including:Two new playable characters, Kongwai Tao and QQ Selezneva.New scenarios and dungeons.A new theme song.Fully voiced dialogue. (Despite the fully voiced advertisement, most scenes are still missing voiced dialogue.)Updated graphics.It was released in Japan on January 26th, 2012, but has not yet been released in North America.Next Re-ImaginationAfter the end credits, the game teases the next tales Re-Imaginating. CG-Art from the DS-sequel Tales of Hearts suggest, that a Tales of Hearts R might be the next Tales remake.
